WebÂ¶

Start the server from the command line:

python -m pycollector.web.server

By default, uploaded schemas will be saved into a rules directory in the current working directory. Specify where to save the uploaded schemas using either the --folder or -F flags:

python -m pycollector.web.server --folder some/other/folder
